summary: Leopold is a widower School Director. His housekeeper announces him on the first day of his retirement, that she will be leaving to her homeland, Romania, in order to be with her daughter ... See full summary »
cast: Jan Decleir|Wim Opbrouck|Maria Popistasu|Manuela Servais|Bert Haelvoet|Tom Van Bauwel|Brigitte De Man|Leny Breederveld|Nadien Van Vossem|Mia Van Roy|Rita Lommée|Camilia Blereau|Gert Portael|Mieke Bouve|Suzanne Saerens|Mia Boels|Viviane Redant|Monika Dumon|Guusje van Tilborgh|Griet van Damme|Andi Vasluianu|Hendrickje van Kerckhove|Nicolas Callot|Henri Wajnberg|Stéphane Auberghen|Pat van Beirs|Lode Van Poucke|Oliver Sdraulig|Ayesha Künzle|Hilde Backx|Linda Theunis|Patrick Harley|Alain Kabuya Tshiamala|Karlijn Sileghem
title: Man zkt vrouw
